DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Project Metric Units
DocTemplateDefinition.Author: Thomas Liebich
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Provision of project units in metric unit system. They are to be provided as SI units, or derived units based on SI units.
**Exception**: Some conversion based units, most notable "Degree" as a conversion based units for the SI unit "Radian", are included in the concept "Project Metric Units".

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Project Imperial Units
DocTemplateDefinition.Author: Thomas Liebich
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of project units in non-metric system, e.g. in imperial unit system. They are provided as conversion based units, or derived units based on conversion based units. For each imperial unit include, a conversion to the metric system has to be provided, using the conversion factor used in the sending application.
